body.p:
You need to create GLPI accounts:
For Shinken: Shinken need a GLPI account to connect it by webservice and get configuration. Create GLPI account (Administration > User). No profil is required for this account.
For example create:
Login: shinken
Password: passshinken
User account: don't use default super-admin GLPI login, create your own account (or import from LDAP, see GLPI documentation for this).
